name: MSCRMImportSolution
description: Import a Solution into a PowerApps/CDS/Dynamics 365 environment
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: solutionFile
inputs.label: Solution File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to the CRM solution zip file on the release agent machine

inputs.name: publishWorkflows
inputs.label: Publish Workflows
inputs.helpMarkDown: Gets or sets whether any processes (workflows) included in the solution should be activated after they are imported.

inputs.name: overwriteUnmanagedCustomizations
inputs.label: Overwrite Unmanaged Customizations
inputs.helpMarkDown: Gets or sets whether any unmanaged customizations that have been applied over existing managed solution components should be overwritten.

inputs.name: skipProductUpdateDependencies
inputs.label: Skip Product Update Dependencies
inputs.helpMarkDown: Gets or sets whether enforcement of dependencies related to product updates should be skipped.

inputs.name: convertToManaged
inputs.label: Convert To Managed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Direct the system to convert any matching unmanaged customizations into your managed solution.

inputs.name: holdingSolution
inputs.label: Holding Solution
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this to perform a stage for upgrade. You can use the Apply Solution Task after this to complete the upgrade.

inputs.name: override
inputs.label: Override Solution
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true will override the solution even if a solution with same version exists

inputs.name: useAsyncMode
inputs.label: Use Async Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true will perform operation in asynchronous mode using ExecuteAsyncRequest

inputs.name: asyncWaitTimeout
inputs.label: Async Wait Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of seconds to wait for async solution import to complete before timing out

inputs.name: logsDirectory
inputs.label: Logs Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to the directory on agent server where logs will be placed. By default this will be $env:System_DefaultWorkingDirectory

inputs.name: logFileName
inputs.label: Import Log Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the solution import log file. By default the name will be ImportLog_[solutionzipfilewithoutextension]_yyyy_MM_dd__HH_mm.xml

OutputVariables.name: SOLUTION_IMPORT_LOG_FILE
OutputVariables.description: The absolute path to solution import log file on the agent server
